results.title: Pharmacologic ACE-Inhibition Mitigates Radiation-Induced Pneumonitis by Suppressing ACE-Expressing Lung Myeloid Cells.
results.journal: Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys
results.text_hl: Mitigation of @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced @DISEASE_Pneumonia @DISEASE_MESH:D011014 @@@pneumonitis@@@ with the @GENE_AP2B1 @GENE_163 @@@ACE-@@@inhibitor @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ was evaluated in the 13.5 Gy @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ partial body irradiation model.

citations.NLM: Sharma GP, Fish BL, Frei AC, Narayanan J, Gasperetti T, Scholler D, Pierce L, Szalewski N, Blue N, Medhora M, Himburg HA. Pharmacologic ACE-Inhibition Mitigates Radiation-Induced Pneumonitis by Suppressing ACE-Expressing Lung Myeloid Cells. Int J Radiat Oncol Biol Phys. 2022 May 1;113(1):177-191. PMID: 35093482

results.title: Molecular Changes in miRNA in Irradiated Rat Kidneys: Role of miR-34a and its Vascular Targets in the Notch Pathway.
results.text_hl: The goal of this work was to determine molecular mechanism(s) of @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation@@@-induced vascular @DISEASE_Anorchia @DISEASE_MESH:C537770 @@@regression@@@ and its mitigation by the drug @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Gao F, Dong W, Liu P, Narayanan J, Fish BL, Jacobs ER, Medhora M. Molecular Changes in miRNA in Irradiated Rat Kidneys: Role of miR-34a and its Vascular Targets in the Notch Pathway. Radiat Res. 2021 Dec 1;196(6):611-622. PMID: 34330145

results.title: Combined Hydration and Antibiotics with Lisinopril to Mitigate Acute and Delayed High-dose Radiation Injuries to Multiple Organs.
results.text_hl: Combined Hydration and Antibiotics with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ to Mitigate Acute and Delayed High-dose @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@Radiation Injuries to@@@ Multiple @DISEASE_Organizing_Pneumonia @DISEASE_MESH:D000092124 @@@Organs@@@.

results.title: Delayed Effects of Acute Radiation Exposure (Deare) in Juvenile and Old Rats: Mitigation by Lisinopril.
results.text_hl: Similar results were observed for irradiated geriatric males, though 33% of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ remained alive at 180 d after irradiation. @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ mitigated @<m>DISEASE_Radiation_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011832 @@@radiation nephropathy@@@ in old @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ of both sexes.

citations.NLM: Medhora M, Gao F, Gasperetti T, Narayanan J, Khan AH, Jacobs ER, Fish BL. Delayed Effects of Acute Radiation Exposure (Deare) in Juvenile and Old Rats: Mitigation by Lisinopril. Health Phys. 2019 Apr;116(4):529-545. PMID: 30624354
